metadata.title: CVE-2022-21125 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incomplete cleanup of microarchitectural fill buffers on some Intel(R)Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enableinformation disclosure via local access.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').

linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
